name: @anteqkois/server
author: Antek Kois
description: Types from Prisma for models and other shared code to my web3 app

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run build:ts && cp ../prisma/schema.prisma .
scripts.build:ts: rm -rf dist && tsc --build tsconfig.esm.json && tsc --build tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.buildOLD: npm run compile && npm run link && npm run copy
scripts.copyOLD: for f in index.js:prisma.js index.d.ts:prisma.d.ts; do IN=$(echo $f | cut -d ':' -f1) OUT=$(echo $f | cut -d ':' -f2) && cp ../node_modules/.prisma/client/$IN ./dist/es6/src/types/$OUT; done
